title: Parametric Funnel
summary: A customizable funnel with a conical top and straight spout.

parameters.top_diameter: Outer diameter of the wide top opening
parameters.spout_diameter: Outer diameter of the narrow spout
parameters.spout_height: Height of the straight spout section

notes: Uses difference() to hollow out the shape. Ensure wall_thickness is less than spout_diameter/2.
